trends: There have been no other sightings in Polson
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsat aprox. 8:51 mdt observerved fireball south of wolf point , mt. came down bright then turned to green then looked liked it exploded way to the south of us my brothetr called me 10 minutes later and said he was going to billings and was at circle , mt. circle is 55 miles south of wolf point - and he saw a bright fire ball right in front of them that turned green an exploded into about 15 pieces-freaked him out - but we are 50 miles north of where he was at and we saw this excactly how he describe it dont know if it was a ufo or meteorite but please get back to me if it is something else or seen by someone else
Summary: dont know if ufo but came down fireball then turn green and exploded
